p: This is the first field-study documenting the uses of natural products for traditional cancer therapy in Algeria. The obtained results reveal the use of 113 medicinal plants species (belonging to 53 families and 104 genera), 10 animal species along with various products and by-products such as honey, olive oil, thorns, urine, milk, animal fat and alkaline water of Zamzam for cancer treatment by Algerian local populations.
